data.quote: No real change in history has ever been achieved by discussions.
data.author: Subhash Chandra Bose

data.quote: Winners don’t do different things; they do things differently
data.author: Shiv Khera

data.quote: Musicians own music because music owns them.
data.author: Virgil Thomson

data.quote: The biggest problem in the world today is not poverty or disease but the lack of love and charity and the feeling of being unwanted
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Actors always want to be musicians, and musicians want to be actors.
data.author: Marilyn Manson

data.quote: Democracy is good. I say this because other systems are worse.
data.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

data.quote: All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them.
data.author: Magic Johnson

data.quote: Anytime you play a finalist it's going to be a challenge.
data.author: Steve Nash

data.quote: Coaching is easy. Winning is the hard part.
data.author: Elgin Baylor

data.quote: Soldiers who always remain faithful to their nation, who are always prepared to sacrifice their lives, are invincible.
data.author: Subhash chandra bose

data.quote: Everybody's talking trash these days, so why not keep quiet?
data.author: Dennis Rodman

data.quote: Everyting negative - pressure, challenges - is all an opportunity for me to rise.
data.author: Kobe Bryant

data.quote: As far as artists and musicians, they don't retire. They might tour less.
data.author: James Hetfield

data.quote: I can accept failure, but I can't accept not trying.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: I don't care what people think. people are stupid.
data.author: Charles Barkley

data.quote: I took a speed-reading course and read War and Peace in twenty minutes. It involves Russia.
data.author: Woody Allen

data.quote: If women can be railroad workers in Russia, why can't they fly in space?
data.author: Valentina Tereshkova

data.quote: I firmly believe that respect is a lot more important, and a lot greater, than popularity.
data.author: Julius Erving

data.quote: I guess people think the taller you are the more dominant you have to be.
data.author: Shaquille O'Neal

data.quote: I play to win, whether during practice or a real game.” And I will not let anything get in the way of me and my competitive enthusiasm to win.
data.author: Michael Jordan
